Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a leadoff home run in the first inning.
Tyrone Taylor hit an RBI double in the second inning.
Mark Vientos hit a grand slam in the second inning.
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Dave Roberts planned to use Landon Knack early in the game to compensate for the absence of two key bullpen pieces.
The Dodgers' top three relievers will enter Game 3 on four days' rest due to Knack's poor performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Outfielder Mookie Betts expects the series to be long and tough.
Catcher Will Smith says the Dodgers are well-equipped for a longer series with roster depth.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game's scoreless streak ended after Landon Knack's performance.
The Dodgers' bats went cold against Mets left-hander Sean Manaea.
